BoardIndexConverter
BoardIndexConverter

Helper class used for converting (x,y) coordinates used by server to one index which is supported by client

Functions
PointToIndex
static int PointToIndex(
Point& point,
int& boardSize
)

Converts Point on cartesian board (x,y) to index.

Parameters
point
Point&

struct containing positive integer coordinates x and y.

boardSize
int&

size of tic-tac-toe board.

Returns

Index of client's game board.

handleGETRequest

Converts index to Point on cartesian board (x,y) .

Index of board cell. Index starts at 0.
